domain_prompt:
DOMAIN BRIEF

# Summary
A robot moves between rooms, picks up balls with its grippers, and drops them in rooms. Each action increases a cumulative total-cost. The state tracks the robot’s room, where each ball is, which grippers are free, and which balls are being carried by which grippers.

# Object Types
- room: Base object
- ball: Base object
- gripper: Base object

# Predicates & Functions
- at-robot: The robot is located at a specific room.
- at: A ball is located at a specific room.
- free: A gripper is not holding any ball.
- carry: A ball is currently held by a specific gripper.
- total-cost: The accumulated numeric cost of all actions taken so far.

# Actions

## Action: move
- Parameters: ?from (room), ?to (room)
- Preconditions:
  - The robot is at-robot ?from.
- Effects:
  - The robot becomes at-robot ?to.
  - It is no longer the case that the robot is at-robot ?from.
  - Increase total-cost by 1.

## Action: pick
- Parameters: ?b (ball), ?r (room), ?g (gripper)
- Preconditions:
  - The robot is at-robot ?r.
  - The ball ?b is at ?r.
  - The gripper ?g is free.
- Effects:
  - The ball ?b becomes carry ?g.
  - It is no longer the case that the ball ?b is at ?r.
  - It is no longer the case that the gripper ?g is free.
  - Increase total-cost by 1.

## Action: drop
- Parameters: ?b (ball), ?r (room), ?g (gripper)
- Preconditions:
  - The robot is at-robot ?r.
  - The ball ?b is carry ?g.
- Effects:
  - The ball ?b becomes at ?r.
  - The gripper ?g becomes free.
  - It is no longer the case that the ball ?b is carry ?g.
  - Increase total-cost by 1.

actions.name: move
preconditions: The robot is in room FROM.
effects: The robot is no longer in room FROM.
The robot is now in room TO.

actions.name: pick
effects: BALL is no longer in ROOM.

actions.name: drop
effects: BALL is no longer carried by GRIPPER.

problems.prompt:
INSTANCE BRIEF

# Summary
The task involves a robot with two grippers and a single ball. The objective is to transport the ball from its starting room to a target room.

# Objects
- room: roo_bcabae, roo_59c817
- gripper: gri_32fce4, gri_42e92a
- ball: bal_07e7cd

# Initial State
- The total-cost is 0.
- The robot is at roo_bcabae.
- bal_07e7cd is at roo_bcabae.

# Goal State
(The plan is successful only when the following are TRUE)
- bal_07e7cd is at roo_59c817.

# Optimization Metric
- Minimize total-cost.

overview.description: Transport the ball bal_07e7cd from roo_bcabae to roo_59c817.
overview.initial_state: Robot is at roo_bcabae. bal_07e7cd is at roo_bcabae.

problems.prompt:
INSTANCE BRIEF

# Summary
A robot with two grippers must move two balls from one room to another while minimizing total-cost.

# Objects
- room: roo_bcabae, roo_59c817
- gripper: gri_32fce4, gri_42e92a
- ball: bal_07e7cd, bal_e201c6

# Initial State
- The total-cost is 0.
- The robot is at-robot roo_bcabae.
- The gripper gri_32fce4 is free.
- The gripper gri_42e92a is free.
- The ball bal_07e7cd is at roo_bcabae.
- The ball bal_e201c6 is at roo_bcabae.

# Goal State
(The plan is successful only when the following are TRUE)
- bal_07e7cd is at roo_59c817.
- bal_e201c6 is at roo_59c817.

# Optimization Metric
- Minimize total-cost.

overview.description: Transport all balls from roo_bcabae to roo_59c817 using a two-gripper robot.
overview.initial_state: Robot in roo_bcabae; gri_32fce4 and gri_42e92a are free; balls in roo_bcabae: bal_07e7cd, bal_e201c6.
overview.goal: All balls are in roo_59c817: bal_07e7cd, bal_e201c6.

problems.prompt:
INSTANCE BRIEF

# Summary
A robot with two grippers is tasked with moving nine balls to a specific target room. Eight of the balls are co-located with the robot, while one ball is located in a different room named roo_isolated.

# Objects
- room: roo_bcabae, roo_59c817, roo_isolated
- gripper: gri_32fce4, gri_42e92a
- ball: bal_07e7cd, bal_e201c6, bal_58c0e0, bal_a03846, bal_d17358, bal_f061eb, bal_d0c241, bal_1a5af3, bal_4eb1be

# Initial State
- total-cost is 0.
- The robot is at roo_bcabae.
- gri_32fce4 is free.
- gri_42e92a is free.
- 8 balls (bal_07e7cd through bal_1a5af3) are at roo_bcabae.
- bal_4eb1be is at roo_isolated.

# Goal State
(The plan is successful only when the following are TRUE)
- All 9 balls must be at roo_59c817.

# Optimization Metric
- Minimize total-cost.

overview.initial_state: Robot at roo_bcabae. 8 balls at roo_bcabae. 1 ball (bal_4eb1be) at roo_isolated.
overview.goal: All 9 balls must be located at roo_59c817.

objects.name: roo_bcabae
objects.summary: Starting room for the robot and 8 balls.
